reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She really knows how to make complex concepts understandable.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! His passion for coding is contagious. Challenging assignments, but you'll learn a ton.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Decent lecturer, but the course material could be more up-to-date. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez brings history to life with his storytelling. Exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Best chemistry professor I've had! Clear explanations and great lab sessions. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dry lectures and unclear expectations. Seems knowledgeable but struggles to convey concepts effectively.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is patient and thorough. Her step-by-step approach to problem-solving is very helpful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject, but can be a harsh grader. Discussions in class are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Kowalski makes physics fun! Her demos and experiments really help illustrate complex concepts.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding course. Prof. Smith encourages critical thinking and lively debates.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but the workload can be overwhelming at times. Dr. Garcia is approachable and helpful.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable professor. Lectures can be dense, but the content is valuable and relevant.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's passion for art is infectious. Her lectures are like guided tours through time. Absolutely fantastic!

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Brilliant mind, but poor teaching skills. Expects students to know everything already. Very frustrating.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Wright brings real-world examples into the classroom. Field trips are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knows his stuff, but can be a bit disorganized. Grading is fair, and he's always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Carter is at the top of her field. Challenging course, but incredibly rewarding. Great research opportunities.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Wong brings real-world business experience to the classroom. Group projects are particularly valuable.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting course content, but Dr. Foster can sometimes go off on tangents. Assignments are creative and engaging.

reviews.subject: Film Studies
reviews.review: Prof. O'Brien's knowledge of cinema is encyclopedic. Watching films in class followed by analysis is eye-opening.
